Text:
This was a request..

I also have uploaded The.Joneses[2009], because of some updates at TPB it is showing that it was uploaded by Anonymous but its by me, grab it..
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5736267/The.Joneses%5B2009%5DDvDRip-x264-AAC%5BEng%5D-MKVGuy

This is so awesome.
Browsing through stuff on TPB, I end up @ a Precious[2009] upload by MKVguy.
Reading through the 20- 30 comments, ONE lone user comments a request for FRONT OF THE CLASS[2008]... 
So, I go to check that out & it's actually ON TPB now, thanks to MKVguy & his super sweet efforts!
I doubt hardly anyone will ever see this comment of mine, but I've bookmarked the uploader & I'll be sure to give pluses where pluses are due.
Thanks!
